snippet: Kevin Anderson upset the Australian Open champion Stanislas Wawrinka in Indian Wells, Calif., joining Milos Raonic in sending home two top-10 players.
abstract: Kevin Anderson beats Stanislas Wawrinka in fourth round of BNP Paribas Open; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Kevin Anderson upset the Australian Open champion Stanislas Wawrinka in Indian Wells, Calif., joining Milos Raonic in sending home two top-10 players.

headline.main: Wawrinka and Murray Lose in Indian Wells
headline.print_headline: Wawrinka and Murray Lose in Indian Wells
